name: Damn Mutant Crocodiles
description:
Made for weekly game jam 90

Had a weird bug come up right at the end so I put together a short level with what was working,  what is there works pretty well though

alt+enter for full screen

controls explained in game, here they are anyway:

Arrows=move

C=shoot

X=jump

Z=Grapple (cancel out of it with jump/shoot)
